title: You know you play to much league of legends when...
body:
You know you play to much league of legends when someone says meditate and you think master yi

You know you play league of legends too much, when you get a project at work or school... And your first thought is ugh.... I have to carry these noobs.

You know you play LoL too much when you talk to a girl named Jenna and call her Janna

You know you play LoL too much when a girl with a fine behind passes and you immediately say: Dat Ashe.


I did copy some but keep it going

replies.body: You know you play too much league of legends when you realize that when you don't play league of legends, you are at the league of legends boards.
http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/disney/images/5/57/44383-Right-in-the-feels-TJAE.jpeg/revision/latest?cb=20140103160059
https://media4.giphy.com/media/Do6GkticVYY3C/giphy.gif
http://67.media.tumblr.com/76f8a957003fc59b25d21bd51b5d6432/tumblr_inline_nyx4t2XWkp1t9pnda_500.gif
Why u do this {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}
when you get mugged late at night and you tell the police you just got ganked...

You know you play too much League of Legends when every analogy you ever make is League of Legends related.

You know you play too much League of Legends when you deny extra hours at work because you have ranked team tryouts and practice (then gets laughed at).

You know you play too much League of Legends when you find the fact that you spent 140 days clocked on this game and you use that number as a bragging right.

You know you play too much League of Legends when after only a day of not playing League of Legends, doing aram on 140 ping on spotty hotel internet sounds like a gift from god. 

You know you play too much League of Legends when you spend more time looking stuff up about League of Legends at work than working itself.

You know you play too much League of Legends when you make a list about how you know about what is too much playing and everything you use it personal examples.

:3
You know you play too much League of Legends when you meet your significant other playing League of Legends.
https://66.media.tumblr.com/6fced82941575e2e43a406fcb3152338/tumblr_mpecmcUSfW1qglee5o1_500.gif
https://media.giphy.com/media/IOCXHPvn3WErm/giphy.gif
Well, we actually didn't meet playing League of Legends. Laughing Fish introduced King Odarth to my stream and then we kinda just talked a bit in club then we started playing a bit.
When you sit at your computer and your default finger position is over QWER.
Sorry, it is still WASD
There was a time in my life for that configuration too, but League eventually won out! xD

zx arrow keys.

Been playing a lot of rpg maker games lately

You know you play too much LoL when you say to a friend your phone that's out of batteries "went OOM."

You know you play too much LoL when your dream girl/guy plays too.

You know you play too much LoL when you have more passionate opinions about your favorite ship than your favorite presidential candidate.

You know you play too much LoL when you refer to your job as "farming minions."

You know you play too much League of Legends when you try to /ff in the middle of a hard exam.

You know you play too much League of Legends when you realize that you just called waiting in line "waiting in queue."

You know you play too much League of Legends when you refer to North America as "NA."

You know you play too much League of Legends when you do this:
http://themetapicture.com/media/funny-gif-Asian-guy-girl-mouse-hand.gif

> [{quoted}](name=Melledoneus,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=0i2kGsUO,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2016-06-26T18:32:06.658+0000)
>
> You know you play too much League of Legends when you try to /ff in the middle of a hard exam.
> 
> You know you play too much League of Legends when you realize that you just called waiting in line "waiting in queue."
> 
> You know you play too much League of Legends when you refer to North America as "NA."
> 
> You know you play too much League of Legends when you do this:
> http://themetapicture.com/media/funny-gif-Asian-guy-girl-mouse-hand.gif

Technically speaking - lines can be called queue's too... they are basically the same thing...
Europeans call lines queues.
You know you play too much League of Legends when you realize that you really have nothing in common with people who don't play League...

story of my league career
oh wait, i dont have one, im bronze trash
Same
you know when you play too much lol if you are playing lol in your dreams...
I had a dream about kindred and that's all the info I will give on the subject.
Seeing Kindred isn't a dream, it's foreshadowing your end.

https://67.media.tumblr.com/5bd2dac78edd507da626407a53f3d13a/tumblr_myac1vBMFL1shf8zxo1_400.gif

... I'm ready...

_"Hurry lamb! Faster!"_

{{champion:203}}:_** ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)**_

I had to do a psychology project once where we tracked our sleeping schedule and dreams for two weeks. Whenever I did dream, it was always about League of Legends. 

I recognize my problem and am okay with it.
If I can thank season 6 for anything, it's that this doesn't happen to me anymore
Yeah now they aren't dreams, they're nightmares.
Since i started to played league, i started to say best_____ EU, worst _____EU.

When you hear a loud sound you think of Sion.

When you don't want to  be near bushes because you fear the Demacia

When you flinch when you see a bright light and wonder how you weren't chunked for half your hp

When you start complaining that Shen didn't ult you after you were in a barfight.

When the power goes out you fear for your life because Nocturne might be ganking you.

When you're worried about running into poisonous mushrooms in the grass

(Thanks, ya bastard{{champion:17}} )
You're welcome...{{champion:17}}

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/aylWqbKkApw/maxresdefault.jpg

He is watching you.
You know you play too much League of Legends when you try out an FPS game and instantly go to QWER. {{item:3070}}
You know you play too much League of Legends when a car passes you, and you wonder what their movespeed is.
You know you play to much League when you are driving down a 3-lane road and refer to the center one as mid lane.
You know you play too much league when you open league at the start of getting on your computer without even realizing it.

You know you play too much League of Legends when your day starts crappy and you perk up because you think you're Kassadin who's gonna hit 6 soon.

You know you play too much League of Legends when you enter the classroom and wonder why there are no towers.
You know you've played too much league when you go into your living room and check behind your couch out of fear that Rengar's there.

You know you play too much league when, Riot doesn't give us what we needed and wanted, THEN caters to the 1% for all their balances, every patch, and every other release, YET..... you still play even though you want to kill all the people you know and love.
unbelievable
You know you play to much league when u on the brink of killing somebody cuz servers are down
you know you play to much league of legends when you make plans to find the kids that "hacked" the servers to see how fast you can punch them through the roof
You know you play too much League when you say "Omnomnom" whenever eating.
